abstract: Staying connected to the town you grew up in, even if life takes you away. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Moyne'.
description: Meet Stephen Giles, a Caramut local, who now lives and works in the city but remains connected to the town through the Caramut Football Club, which he started playing for when he was 8 years old. He is now a patron of the club, just like his father was, and has helped the community to keep it alive, recognising its importance to the locals. He even puts on the footy boots again to play in the Seniors League.
